name: Clumsy Knight
description: Those familiar with the series of games «Heroes of Might and Magic», will see the obvious parallels in this game, and an old style but story: the valiant savior, the hero, to become the king's son in law, and, of course, get a half a kingdom. It was then down to business and taken our mammonish protagonist.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 1 GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Video Memory Storage: 512 MB available space
